EmailTemplate.name: 2018BK-08 MST 67A Upgrade to a MST 70B ADS-B Out transponder EXTERNAL.2018BK-08
EmailTemplate.subject: 2018 BendixKing Bulletin Updates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Sales Bulletin | February 16, 2018
BendixKing would like to present to you the following 2018 Sales Bulletins. The complete list of 2018 Sales Bulletins are available at MyAerospace/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins <[[https://myaerospace.honeywell.com/parts-and-repairs/downloads/sales-bulletins#sort=%40fdisplayname2077%20descending]]>. Dealers must log-in to view these bulletins.
Dealer Sales Bulletins:
2018BK-08 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018BK-08 MST 67A Upgrade to a MST 70B ADS-B Out transponder.pdf]]> Upgrade your MST 67A transponder-equipped aircraft to be ADS-B Out compliant. Announcing the promotional pricing to upgrade from the MST 67A to a MST 70B ADS-B Out transponder.
Operator Bulletins:
2018BK_O_07 KSN 770 Stack Rebate Promotion. Announcing the Rebate Stack Promotion for the KSN 770, the KT 74 ADS-B OUT Mode S Transponder, the KGX 130R ADS-B Traffic and Weather Receiver and the KMA 30 Audio Panel.
Find your nearest BendixKing Area Sales Manager by visiting our website: http://www.bendixking.com/Company/Sales-Team <[[http://www.bendixking.com/Company/Sales-Team]]>
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
